title: Copying a league install updated, to a fresh league install on another hd or even pc
body:
Is it possible to copy just the files within the LoL folder, and paste them in to a fresh installed LoL on another hd or even pc? after doing such would running the repair tool, then verify be smart to do. 
I have 2 computers that i had to get new hard drives for, and ive fresh installed League on both, if i can speed up the update by copying and pasting an already updated version that would be great.
thanks in advance
Immortal Vamps

replies.body: You can try, but it may take just as long.  The patcher may freak out and scan your files anyway for any corruption that can take some time.  Only then will it proceed with checking for any updates and allow you to login.  It wouldn't hurt to try it, but you may be better off running it through the normal install.  I hope that helps!
why is this? if i can copy all the files from say, a friends a computer and install it that way, why would the intstaller freak out? i do this ALL the time with other games.
